casebody.data:
IN RE: Foreclosure of Real Property Under Deed of Trust from Vicque THOMPSON and Christalyn Thompson, in The Original Amount of $205,850.00, and Dated September 26, 2007 and Recorded on September 28, 2007 in Book 2953 at Page 653 and Rerecorded/modified/corrected on February 27, 2015 in Book 4266, Page 911, Onslow County Registry Trustee Services of Carolina, LLC, Substitute Trustee No. 159P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Terence Odell Barber, Attorney at Law, for Thompson, Vicque, et al. Renner Jo St. John, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, M. Rachael Dimont, Attorney at Law, Ashley S. Rusher, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for USAA Federal Savings Bank.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of May 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
